New Records: South Africa defended the lowest total in a T20 match.
It is the lowest target Bangladesh have failed to chase in a T20.
South Africa leads 9-0 in head-to-head T20 matches against Bangladesh.
Key Match Events: Taskin Ahmed was unable to score the required runs in the final over.
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa captain Markram expressed nervousness and fatigue during the final over.
Bangladesh captain Najmul stated that his team should have won the match and praised Rishad's bowling.
Klaasen, the Player of the Match, mentioned the pressure and experience in the team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium, New York.
The pitch received criticism but provided thrilling matches.
